message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a fantastic product that I believe would be highly valuable to you. Given its unique features and potential, I'm proposing an initial price of $1,400,000. I'm confident this represents a fair deal considering the significant return on investment you'll experience.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. While I appreciate the value you see in the product, I am looking to keep my expenses within a certain budget. I am willing to pay $1,350,000 for the product.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your budget constraints, but I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher. I could consider letting it go for $1,380,000.  This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. After careful consideration, I am able to offer $1,365,000 for the product. I hope this proposal meets your expectations and allows us to move forward.
